flawed_nl_solution:
Last week Maya read 5 * 300 = <<5*300=1500>>1500 pages of text.
This week she doubled the result, so she read 2 * 1500 = <<2*1500=30000>>30000 pages.
In total Maya read 1500 + 30000 = <<1500+30000=31500>>31500 pages of text.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 30000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
